ovdesc.p: This will be a new work file that may be used to specify the CG Transaction Base build requirements.
This application will be used to specify the portfolio & security master id combinations for which the build process will be carried out.
The application will create a concat file CG.BASE.BUILD.TODAY that will be processed by an end of day process (EOD.BUILD.CG.TXN.BASE)

desc.p: This field specifies the condition to be used when selecting the field in FIELD.NO .
Must be any of 'EQ', 'NE', 'LT', 'GT', 'LE', 'GE', 'RG', 'NR', 'LK', 'UL'.
Mandatory input if FIELD.NO is entered.
This field is reserved for future use
NOINPUT
This field can indicate the portfolio number for which the CG transaction base needs to be built.
This field will be used in conjunction with the SM.ID field to select portfolio and security master combinations for which the CG transaction base will be built.
If this field is entered then the fields FIELD.NO, OPERAND & FIELD.CONTENT must be left empty.
If entered the field must contain an existing portfolio id.
This field can indicate the security number for which the CG transaction base needs to be built.
This field will be used in conjunction with the SAM.ID field to select portfolio and security master combinations for which the CG transaction base will be built.
If this field is entered then the fields FIELD.NO, OPERAND & FIELD.CONTENT must be left empty.
If entered the field must contain an existing security master id
The field can also contain the value 'ALL' to indicate all securities
This field will contain the value to be matched according to the OPERAND and FIELD.NO fields.
Optional Input.
This field can be entered as either a field number or field name on the CUSTOMER file. The field name will be displayed.
Optional Input.
If entered must be a valid field on the CUSTOMER file.
This field is the ID field of the file. It will comprise of the application indicator 'CG' concatenated to a julian date and a sequence number of 5 digits.
The record can be input and changed only on the day it was initially input.
Standard T24 local reference field.
User defined.
This field will contain a list of the Customer id's, portfolio group name & security master id combinations for which the CG Transaction base will be built.
NOINPUT
